column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Several months ago I had to travel to a city in the midwest for a business conference .
#id=2
#text=I needed to take a plane to get there .
#id=3
#text=I had to purchase a ticket , so I went online to a travel website .
#id=4
#text=There were a lot of options to choose from .
#id=5
#text=I first picked the day I wanted to travel , and what airport I was leaving from , and where I was going to .
#id=6
#text=I then had to choose when I wanted to leave , in the morning or the afternoon .
#id=7
#text=I chose everything I needed and purchased my ticket with my credit card .
#id=8
#text=The day of my flight , I drove to the airport and parked in the parking garage .
#id=9
#text=I took my luggage inside to the ticketing counter .
#text=I told the attendant I where I was flying to and the flight number , and that I had a bag to check .
#text=She took my identification card and the flight information , and checked me in for the flight .
#text=She put a big tag on my bag , and put it on a moving conveyor belt behind her and it disappeared .
#text=I knew it would be safe and arrive when I did , but it did seem kind of mysterious .
#text=I then took my ticket and went to the security checkpoint .
#text=I went through a large machine , but I was n't nervous .
#text=I then went to my gate to wait for my flight .
#text=Eventually we were told that we could board .
#text=We all got on the plane and took our seats .
#text=When everyone was on , we fastened our seatbelts and began to move .
#text=It was fun looking out the window .
#text=All of sudden we were speeding very fast down the runway , and then lifted into the air .
#text=It 's surprising such a big plane can fly so easily .
#text=I watched as the world seemed to get smaller .
#text=We then leveled off and flew straight to our destination .
#text=I slept a bit on the plane , and read a book that I brought .
#text=They did offer us some snacks and drinks .
#text=A short time later , the Captain announced we were going to land .
#text=Everyone put their items away , and we landed soon after .
#text=When we got to the gate , everyone undid their seat belts and started to exit the plane .
#text=It was a very good and smooth flight in the airplane .
